Customer hereby agrees that this condition is neither a defect in the provision of Company’s services, a breach of this contract, nor a breach of warranty hereunder.

III. CESSATION OF GLASS RESTORATION SERVICES DUE TO DEFECT
Company may declare the glass incapable of restoration and in need of replacement. if upon further inspection of the glass and any frame or support thereof or during the glass restoration process, the Company determines in its sole discretion that the subject glass or its frame or support is sufficiently defective that it will not reasonably withstand the glass restoration process. Thereupon, Company may cease its restoration of the subject glass without refund of any amount to Customer. In the event Company deems the defect immaterial and proceeds with the glass restoration process, Company shall not be liable for glass breakage during the process.

IV. METAL RESTORATION SERVICES
Customer acknowledges that GlassTech performs a range of corrective services to non-ferrous metals and is free to deploy any of these processes in order to properly complete the project. GlassTech will not field-test the grade of metal nor the depth or extent of corrosion but will visually inspact damage prior to commencing restorative actions; therefore, if the metal grade is unknown or improperly disclosed to GlassTech then GlassTech will be indemnified against breakage, inferior outcomes or any other degradation of the metal. The customer further acknowledges that corrosion or other damage which results in separation of seams (welds) or other jointed locations will not be the responsibility of GlassTech while conducting usual restorative processes.

V. METAL COATING SERVICES
GlassTech applies a long-lasting, nanocoating to metal which cures to a 9.5H hardness. I understand the coating will leave a gloss-like finish which adds to the beauty of the restored metal and deepens the tint of the natural metal approximately half of a shade. if a matte finish is preferred, this must be so stated in the quote before commencing work.
